title: Honor
body: How can i make honor lvl 3 faster ?

replies.body: go make a sandwich in the middle of a game

If the still have the Honorable Opponent you could have stayed after games and talked nicely to people, unfortunately for now that isn't an option.  In game I always feel so rush I don't have much time for pleasantries.

Playing games earn you honour passively. 

Honouring a team mate or getting an honour helps you progress faster, so be on your best behaviour.

be... honorable?!?

dont rage, make good plays, use your abilities in the right way (kayle dont ult yourself, save your fkin teammates)

do the right things
make good plays, not bad mistakes
